protein.specific_function: May be involved in the regulation of meiosis and/or differentiation of testicular germ cells during spermatogenesis. Exhibits intrinsic phosphatase activity towards both phospho-seryl/threonyl and -tyrosyl residues of myelin basic protein, with similar specific activities in vitro.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Nakamura K, Shima H, Watanabe M, Haneji T, Kikuchi K: Molecular cloning and characterization of a novel dual-specificity protein phosphatase possibly involved in spermatogenesis. Biochem J. 1999 Dec 15;344 Pt 3:819-25.
